com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters

Class UppercaseSeriesFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters.UppercaseSeriesFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenFilter

    public class UppercaseSeriesFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenFilter
    Looks for a series of 2+ words in all upper-case, and transforms them into lower-case. Unknown words will be given an initial upper case.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
